        public void setVisibility(boolean visible)
        Sets the visibility of the TrainLineView. The visibility will also effect the usability (e.g. mouse click).
        Parameters:
        visible - True will make this visible, false will make it invisible.

      • close

        public void close()
        Description copied from class: GameScreen
        Closes the game screen by removing all controls from the game screen. Normally this method is called via METRO.closeGameScreen(GameScreen) to use the correct control manager.

        close in class GameScreen
